full_text.9:
Final thoughts: 
(1) opioid supply from long ago have effects today because of spillovers
(2) drug control problems anywhere harm health everywhere
(3) Opioid deaths are related to historical supply of opioids
(4) Long run consequences from short term impacts of supply.
full_text.10:
@Cutler_econ and @travis_donahoe show:
(1) Modeling spillovers -- past user bringing in current users into the market --  is essential to explaining increase in opioid deaths.
